name: problem-set-3_2
description: ### Directions 1. Fork and clone this lab 2. Run `npm install` to load project dependencies. 3. Complete coding exercises in a file named `exercises.js` file. (You will find the questions in `problem-set.md`) 4. Check for style by running `./node_modules/.bin/eslint exercises.js` in the terminal. 5. When you are done, push your final commits and open a PR.
